description: This file defines the interface NoteRepository, which extends JpaRepository for managing Note entities identified by UUID. It includes a custom method for paginated search by Note titles.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Note entities, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom query for title search.

methods.name: findByTitleContainingIgnoreCase
methods.description: Finds a page of Notes with titles that contain the specified string, case-insensitive, supporting pagination.
